name: Interface naming convention - case control
description: Interface names must start with an uppercase character
output:
This report lists all the Interfaces with the first letter in lower case.
It provides the following information:
 Interface full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected. Coding naming conventions allow teams to collaborate efficiently.
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
alternativeName: Ensure to have the name of the interface according to the naming convention

qualityStandards.name: Inconsistent Naming Conventions for Identifiers
qualityStandards.description: The product's code, documentation, or other artifacts do not consistently use the same naming conventions for variables, callables, groups of related callables, I/O capabilities, data types, file names, or similar types of elements.
